org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa
Class LabelPositionConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.LabelPositionConverter

public class LabelPositionConverter
extends java.lang.Object

A LabelPositionConverter can convert a label-on-state FSA (acceptance condition on states) to a label-on-transition FSA. Note that the unreachable parts may not be correct.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

static FSA convertToLabelOnState(FSA src)
          Converts a label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states to an equivalent label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states.
static FSA convertToLabelOnTransition(FSA src)
          Converts a label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states to an equivalent label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states.

public LabelPositionConverter()
Method Detail

convertToLabelOnTransition

public static FSA convertToLabelOnTransition(FSA src)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts a label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states to an equivalent label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states.

Parameters:
src - a label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states
Returns:
an equivalent label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the labels of src are not on states

convertToLabelOnState

public static FSA convertToLabelOnState(FSA src)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts a label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states to an equivalent label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states.

Parameters:
src - a label-on-transition FSA with acceptance condition on states
Returns:
an equivalent label-on-state FSA with acceptance condition on states
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the labels of src are not on transitions

convert

public static FSA convert(FSA src)
Converts the label position of an automaton. If the input automaton has labels on states, an equivalent automaton with labels on transitions is returned. If the input automaton has labels on transitions, an equivalent automaton with labels on states is returned.

Parameters:
src - an input automaton
Returns:
an equivalent automaton with the opposite label position
